resources

Interface Resource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CubeMapTexture, EasyFiltering, Mesh, Renderable, Spline, Texture, Texture2D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTexture, AudioBuffer, AudioSource, BezierSpline, BlinnPhongShader, CatmullRomSpline, CubeMesh, CubicSpline, DynamicTexture2D, Fbo, FxaaShader, GammaCorrectionShader, GrayscaleShader, InvertShader, QuadMesh, ReinhardToneMappingShader, Shader, ShadowShader, SimpleSpline, SkyBoxShader, SolidColorShader, StaticCubeMapTexture, StaticMesh, StaticTexture, StaticTexture2D, TexturedQuadShader, Ubo, Vao

    public interface Resource
    Basic methods for resources.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDataSizeInAction()
      Returns the resource's data size in action (this means the VRAM or the sound system).
      int getDataSizeInRam()
      Returns the resource's data size in RAM.
      ResourceId getResourceId()
      Returns the resource's unique resource id.
      boolean isUsable()
      Determines wheter this resource is usable.
      void release()
      Releases the resource.
      void update()
      Updates the resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSizeInRam

        int getDataSizeInRam()
        Returns the resource's data size in RAM.
        Returns:
        the resource's data size in RAM (in bytes)

      • getDataSizeInAction

        int getDataSizeInAction()
        Returns the resource's data size in action (this means the VRAM or the sound system).
        Returns:
        the resource's data size in action (in bytes)

      • update

        void update()
        Updates the resource.

      • release

        void release()
        Releases the resource.

      • isUsable

        boolean isUsable()
        Determines wheter this resource is usable. If it returns false, you can't use if for anything.
        Returns:
        true if usable, false otherwise

      • getResourceId

        ResourceId getResourceId()
        Returns the resource's unique resource id.
        Returns:
        the resource's unique resource id.
